name: Influenza
title: Influenza
description: This value set is under development
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for influenza diagnoses),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis or Condition),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent influenza diagnoses),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions)
